channel.title: Tech on Flomza
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Flomza

item.title: Create a Website using Hugo, PaperMod, and QOwnNotes
item.description:
Intro

The following guide details how I originally set up this very website. It also includes sources so you can expand on what I did easier with the official documents from the tools themselves.

My website was set up on Fedora Linux, however I have placed links throughout to aid others in unique setups.

Definitions

Hugo: A framework used to create websites, commonly used for blogs.

PaperMod: A theme for your Hugo website. Please do consider using other themes, the official list can be found [here](insert link here).

item.title: Ultimate CCNA & Network+ Guide for C-TEC Cybersecurity
item.description: Originally posted on Discord for C-TEC Cybersecurity students, this comprehensive guide combines CCNA and Network+ preparation, highlighting their overlapping topics and shared study strategies. It focuses on how to make the most of C-TECâ€™s provided resources and offers practical advice on staying focused in class, using study tools effectively, and maximizing your chances of certification success.
